synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: 4-aminothiophenol (225 mg, 1.8 mmol), sodium hydride (58 mg, 1.45 mmol), 1,3-dimethyl-2-imidazolidinone (DMI) (10 mL), sym-pentachlorocorannulene (100 mg, 0.24 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.equipment: flame-dried and degassed round bottom flask
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: extracted three times with EtOAc and water, dried over MgSO4

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: sym-pentakis(4-aminothiophenyl)corannulene (3.0 mg, 3.5 μmol, 4 equiv.), 2-formyl-6-methylpyridine (2.5 mg, 21 μmol, 24 equiv.), tetrakis(acetonitrile)copper(I) tetrafluoroborate (3.3 mg, 10.5 μmol, 12 equiv.)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: filtered and washed with diethyl ether

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: 2-formyl-1,10-phenanthroline (4.8 mg, 23 μmol, 10 equiv.), cobalt(II) bis(trifluoromethanesulfonyl)imide (8.2 mg, 11.5 μmol, 5 equiv.), sym-pentakis(4-aminothiophenyl)corannulene (4.0 mg, 4.6 μmol, 2 equiv.)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: filtered and washed with diethyl ether

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: 2-formyl-1,10-phenanthroline (4.8 mg, 23 μmol, 10 equiv.), zinc(II) bis(trifluoromethanesulfonyl)imide (7.2 mg, 11.5 μmol, 5 equiv.), sym-pentakis(4-aminothiophenyl)corannulene (4.0 mg, 4.6 μmol, 2 equiv.)
synthesis_conditions.washing_method: filtered and washed with diethyl ether

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: sample of 1·10BF4, 2-formyl-1,10-phenanthroline (3.0 mg, 14 µmol, 20 equiv. per assembly), Co(BF4)2·6H2O (2.5 mg, 7.3 µmol, 10.2 equiv. per assembly)
synthesis_conditions.temperature: 333 K for 24 h and then at 353 K for 72 h

materials.material_name: Host-guest interaction of corannulene with 1 and 3

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: corannulene (5-10 equiv), 1 or 3 in CD3CN (1.0–3.0 mM)
synthesis_conditions.temperature: 298 K and then 353 K for 24 hr for 3
